title: Drawing, "Elevation of the Side of an Ornate Cabinet", 1550–75
medium: Black chalk; pen and brown ink on cream laid paper, laid down
description: One side of an ornate cabinet shown in elevation with a winged, armless satyress prominately featured in profile. One half of cabinet design is shown with a large rectangular section supported by the design of lower verticle doors. Above, is an entablature with a vase of fowers between cornice and pedestles on top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Elevation of the Side of an Ornate Cabinet", 1550–75.
1550–75. Black chalk; pen and brown ink on cream laid paper, laid down. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-315.
